content: if you loved my other earwarmer patterns you will love this **free pattern** too it ll be part of a set matching beanies and a cowl so keep your eyes opened and check my site regularly for updates say hello to the ***crossrows earwarmer*** perfect for the chilly but sunny autumn walks the name of the design comes from the stitches i used to create the pattern and i was playing with the words to come up with a fun and easy-to-remember name it s a fun and easy pattern to use up some scrap aran/worsted yarn and it is ***easily adjustable*** to fit any size **difficulty ** easy/advanced beginner **size ** one size only to fit an average adult s head but it can be easily adjusted to make a bigger or smaller size **us terms** used throughout i hope you will enjoy this pattern as much as i loved designing it happy crocheting ***krisztina***
